Type: Candy
Price: 36.00

Sour, Sweet, With a Little Spook!

Spooky SOUR PUNCH® Straws are available for purchase online. These deliciously fruity & sour exotic treats are up for grabs! SOUR PUNCH Straws are proudly manufactured by the American Licorice® Company.

  • Each tray holds our new SOUR PUNCH candy flavour: Spooky Straws
  • Stock up on SOUR PUNCH Straws for treats at the office, at gatherings, or while binge-watching your favourite shows
  • Each pack is bursting with mouthwatering Halloween flavour. What's more? They're a low fat, low sodium, Halal & Kosher certified snack

  • Halal
  • Kosher
  • American Candy

3.7oz. | 24 Pack

entry.title: Red Vines Candy Corn Licorice 4oz - 9 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Licorice
Type: Candy
Price: 13.50

 Red Vines | Candy Corn 

If you love Candy Corn you must try this new fall twist on your favourite licorice twists! The American Licorice® Company has made RED VINES  using a new and quite unique candy corn recipe. It tastes exactly like Candy Corn just in a licorice shape and texture!

Since RED VINES candy is always fat free and Kosher certified, feel free to smile while taking a bite!

  • Fat-Free 
  • Kosher Certified  

 

24 x 5oz Trays

entry.title: Red Vines Strawberry Twists Sugar Free 5 oz - 12 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Licorice
Type: Candy
Price: 28.80

 Sugar-Free Strawberry Licorice 

 RED VINES Strawberry Licorice Twists are a Sugar Free version of the classic red licorice, but with a delicious strawberry flavor. Using the same simple ingredients in red licorice, you can now enjoy these soft & chewy twists without the added sugar. Sugar Free RED VINES licorice twists pair well with salty snacks like chips or popcorn, adding a sweet fruit flavored treat to your day.

  • Sugar-Free
  • Fat-Free 
  • Kosher Certified  

 

12 x 5oz Packs

entry.title: Red Vines Black Licorice Sugar Free 5oz - 12 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Licorice
Type: Candy
Price: 28.80

 Sugar-Free Black Licorice

RED VINES Sugar Free Black Licorice delivers great taste and real black licorice flavor with zero sugar. Pair these soft & chewy Sugar Free black licorice twists with your favorite afternoon snack recipe, or enjoy with salty chips or popcorn. 

The 5-ounce bag is the perfect size for sharing at home or at the office. Enjoy the classic RED VINES black licorice candy texture and sweetness that satisfies – even when they’re sugar free! Since RED VINES candy is always fat free and Kosher certified, feel free to smile while taking a bite!

  • Sugar-Free
  • Fat-Free 
  • Kosher Certified  

 

12 x 5oz Packs

entry.title: Sour Punch Sweet Bites Not So Sour 5oz - 12 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Licorice
Type: Candy
Price: 19.80

Not SO Sour Sweet Bites

Assorted Flavours

Introducing NEW Sweet Bites®, one of the latest innovations from SOUR PUNCH candy. Enjoy these soft & chewy Bites in 4 uplifting flavors: Dream Berry, Passion Punch, Grateful Grape and Cotton Candy. Not a sour candy fan? Not a problem! These delectable bite-sized candy pieces were made just for you. Skip the sour tingle and indulge in the perfect amount of sweetness to satisfy your candy craving.

  • Halal & Kosher Certified

5oz x 12 

INGREDIENTS:

CORN SYRUP, SUGAR, WHEAT FLOUR, HIGH FRUCTOSE CORN SYRUP, CITRIC ACID, MALIC ACID, TARTARIC ACID, FOOD STARCH MODIFIED, PALM OIL, GLYCERYL MONOSTEARATE, SODIUM CITRATE, GLYCERIN, ARTIFICIAL FLAVOR, COLOR ADDED RED 40.

ALLERGEN INFORMATION: CONTAINS WHEAT

entry.title: Waterbridge Mini Allsorts - 15 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Waterbridge
Type: Candy
Price: 37.50

Waterbridge English Liquorice Mini Allsorts

What could be sweeter than 200 grams of your favourite Waterbridge Allsorts in delightful bite sizes? We've miniaturized this classic English treat infused with natural colours and flavours. Enjoy mini jelly buttons, mini licquorice rolls and twists, and mini fruit sandwiches, each offering fun shapes and tastes. And don't forget to pick out all those tasty mini coconut rolls, a taste of the Caribbean, which offer unique tastes. This is one pouch of sweetness that will disappear fast, so make sure you have a few on hand for snacking delights!

200 g Pouches | 15 Count 

Ingredients: Sugar, Molasses, Glucose Syrup (Wheat),  Enriched Wheat Flour, Desiccated Coconut (Contains Sulphites), Cornflour, Palm Oil, Gelatine,Glycerol, Natural Colours, Fruit & Vegetable Juices for Colour, Cocoa Powder, Flavours,  Liquorice Extract, Beeswax. 


Contains: Gluten.

entry.title: Waterbridge Dolly Mix - 15 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Waterbridge
Type: Candy
Price: 37.50

Dolly Mix

Who wouldn’t love a Dolly Mix that comes straight from England, the home of this traditional sweet? Dolly Mix consists of all-natural colours and flavours, and the soft fondant is sugar-coated and fruity from the first to the last bites. It’s an iconic treat from the English, so grab a handful of British nostalgia. Find a Waterbridge Dolly Mix 200 gram pouch priced to satisfy your sweet tooth and frugal leanings at your nearest Canadian retailer.

200 g Pouches | 15 Count 

Ingredients: Sugar, Glucose Syrup (Wheat), Gelatine, Corn Flour, Palm Oil, Colour, Citric Acid, Low Fat Cocoa Powder, Natural Flavour.

Contains: Wheat

entry.title: Waterbridge Allsorts - 15 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Waterbridge
Type: Candy
Price: 37.50

Waterbridge English Liquorice Allsorts

If you thought our seasonal towers were big you haven't seen anything yet! Our 1kg bag of Waterbridge Allsorts is our biggest pack yet! With a handle perfect for carrying sweet snacks on all your adventures and a resealable clasp for easy storage and freshness. In this 1kg bag of Waterbridge Allsorts you'll find all of the pieces you love; coconut rolls, jelly buttons, liquorice twists, liquorice rolls and delicious raspberry, chocolate and lemon fruit sandwiches! Never run out of your favourite liquorice snacks with this fantastic pack!

200 g Pouches | 15 Count 

Ingredients: Sugar, (sugar, molasses, glucose syrup), Enriched wheat flour, Desiccated coconut (contains sulphites), Vegetable oils 9palm, coconut), Gelatin (beef), Corn starch, Glycerol, Cocoa powder, Liquorice extract, Caramel, Beet red, Tumeric, Paprika extract, Beeswax, Natural flavours, Spirulina concentrate, Fruit & vegetable concentrates (blackcurrant, carrot)


May Contain: Milk, Soya

entry.title: Waterbridge Pontefract Cakes - 15 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Waterbridge
Type: Candy
Price: 37.50

Straight from the liquorice capital of England comes Waterbridge Pontefract Cakes! If you want a rich, robust liquorice flavour, you don’t have to go any farther than these traditional sweets. Made using time-honoured recipes, our Pontefract Cakes are genuine in every way. Savoury and satisfying, you’ll find this embossed, luxurious treat to be a mouth-watering treasure. Make sure you purchase enough 200 gram pouches so you have Waterbridge Pontefract Cakes on hand for every occasion and craving. They’re all-natural, so you can feel great about eating them, as well as giving them as gifts.

200 g Pouches | 15 Count 

Ingredients: Treacle, Glucose Syrup, Corn Starch, Invert Sugar Syrup, Wheat Flour, Liquorice Extract, Modified Potato Starch, Vegetable Oil (palm kernel, coconut, sunflower), Natural Flavour, Carnauba Wax. 


Contains wheat.
